channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: What Are ATACMS, the U.S. Missiles That May Be Used Against Russia?
item.description: In a major policy shift, the Biden administration has authorized Ukraine to use the ballistic missiles within Russia.

item.title: Trump team is seeking to ease US rules for self-driving cars
item.description: If new rules enable cars without human controls, that would directly benefit Elon Musk, Tesla's CEO and a Trump mega-donor.

item.title: Airstrikes Hit Central Beirut for First Time in Weeks
item.description: The attacks came as Israel’s military has been pounding an area just outside the Lebanese capital with some of the heaviest waves of bombardment in mo...

item.title: Biden Visits Amazon, Vowing Help to Fight Climate Change
item.description: The president toured the rainforest and promised Brazil funds for environmental initiatives, even as the incoming Trump administration appears poised ...

item.title: More people are dropping out of the creator economy as those at the top get a bigger share of brand deals
item.description: The share of Bank of America customers earning income as content creators has declined for three years in a row.

item.title: Wall Street may now have to take Trump literally as the battle for Treasury secretary focuses on a centerpiece campaign pledge
item.description: Trump's advisers are seeking assurances from the top Treasury candidates that they are committed to his aggressive tariffs, sources told the FT.

item.title: Biden Allows Ukraine to Strike Russia With Long-Range U.S. Missiles
item.description: With two months left in office, the president for the first time authorized the Ukrainian military to use the system known as ATACMS to help defend it...

item.title: What Are ATACMS, the U.S. Missiles That May Be Used Against Russia?
item.description: In a major policy shift, the Biden administration has authorized Ukraine to use the ballistic missiles within Russia.

item.title: Shouting Racial Slurs, Neo-Nazi Marchers Shock Ohio’s Capital
item.description: The group’s actions in Columbus on Saturday, part of a recent pattern of white supremacist incidents in the country, were condemned by officials aroun...

item.title: Ramaswamy sees ‘massive cuts’ for contractors in efficiency push
item.description: "We expect certain agencies to be deleted outright. We expect mass reduction in force in areas of the federal government that are bloated."

item.title: A proposal for more logging to curb wildfires could boost timber harvests by more than 200%
item.description: A U.S. Forest Service proposal would overhaul the Northwest Forest Plan that governs about 38,000 square miles in Oregon, Washington and California.

item.title: Israeli Airstrikes Hit Central Beirut and Its Southern Suburbs
item.description: Israel’s strikes killed Hezbollah’s de facto spokesman in central Beirut and flattened buildings south of Lebanon’s capital.

item.title: Trump Picks Brendan Carr to Lead F.C.C.
item.description: Mr. Carr, who currently sits on the commission and is a vocal critic of Big Tech, has said the agency should regulate the tech industry.

item.title: After Flurry of Cabinet Picks, Trump Rethinks Candidates for Treasury Secretary
item.description: President-elect Donald J. Trump is expected to invite the contenders for the role, including Kevin Warsh and Marc Rowan, to Mar-a-Lago this week.

item.title: Biden Allows Ukraine to Strike Russia With Long-Range U.S. Missiles
